Key:
(Quite some time has passed since Origami
and I started dating.)

(Our relationship is stronger than ever.
It really feels like we can trust each other.)

(Today, we were spending some alone time
together.)
Shido, I propose an idea.
Hm? What is it?

All this time, I had been putting forth too
much effort in pursuing you.
W-Well, you were kinda aggressive at times.

I believed it to be the way to prove my love
to you.

Y-Yeah, I could see that. It got overwhelming
sometimes.

However, I felt heavy guilt, and have since
realized it was unacceptable.
Well, everything is better in moderation.

From now on, I will not be a woman who
pines after you, but rather will be the kind
of woman for whom you pine.
Oh. I can't wait for that.
I will be the woman you need.
Um, Origami, that's not necessary.

Why not? I want you to tell me whenever
you want something from me.
It's because I already do need you, Origami.
...Really?

Yes. The only thing I want is to be next to
you, Origami.

But I want you to want me more, Shido.
Is anything holding you back?

Well, not exactly... But we're still students,
you know? Maybe it's good to show some
self-restraint.

Then I will. I choose not to pursue you,
but rather will be the person you want
to pursue.
Okay.

I will no longer be she who sniffs gym clothes,
and will instead be the one whose gym clothes
are sniffed.
O-Okay, about that...
...Is that wrong?
U-Um, let's not be too hasty.

Okay. You might not know it now, but one
day, I'm sure you will want me.
I... I'll try.

(I looked at my watch and saw that it was
pretty late. We lost track of time.)
Look at the time.

...I can't stay like this. It is almost time for
training.
Huh? Training?
That's right.
(What could it be? Is she on a diet?)

Hey, Origami. I'm not sure what it is, but
don't do anything bad for your health, okay?

Not a problem. On the contrary, I am taking
good care of my health. Hang on.
Huh? You're doing it here?

(Origami went into the corner of the room
and began removing her clothes.)
Wait! What are you doing, Origami?!

(She took off her shirt, completely exposing
her upper body.)

(I saw her porcelain skin, and she just barely
blocked her chest with her arms. I gulped.)

(She wasn't the least bit shy, but her motive
didn't seem inherently naughty.)

(I find her stunning, making it impossible to
look away. More like, I didn't want to.)

(Her smooth, pale skin shone in the light
of the sunset. It was divine. Her beauty
took my breath away.)
Origami, here you go again...
(The words left my mouth meekly.)
I thought about what you wanted, and so―

My conclusion was to work hard for a bigger
chest.
HOW DID YOU ARRIVE AT THAT CONCLUSION?!

(Her train of thoughts eludes me. All of
a sudden, it was like my body was made
of gelatin.)

I found the bikini issue in your room,
compared my body to the models inside,
and came to a decision.

Issue... You mean the manga magazine I have?
When did you find it, or look through it?
I know everything that belongs here.
...Gotcha.

Unfortunately, I could not find anything more
explicit.

Please don't! Don't go through my stuff
when I'm not around.

What I did notice, however, were several
items featuring voluptuous women.

Well, it's not exactly uncommon inside
magazines, but that's not why I'm reading
them.

That is not true. You have a preference for
women with bigger chests. I have caught
you oogling women on our dates.

D-Did I do that? Even if I did, um, it was
nothing more than instinct...
So you are telling me you hate large chests?
Erm... Well, when you put it that way, um...

So, big chests are the surest way to stimulate
a man's instincts.
I-Is that so...?

That is why I have been doing whatever I can
to expand my chest.
H-How do you manage that?!

I heard by massaging them, they increase in
size. Moving every day helps your chest grow.
Really?! Then could you do it another time?

If I am being observed, the growth hormones
may secrete in bigger quantities.

Think about this objectively. Do you think
every woman in the world with a big chest
is doing that?
It is certainly likely.
Where are you getting this info from?!

Speaking to your chest also aids their
growth. Shido, try speaking to my chest.
What are they, plants?!
...I believe it is working already!
If they grow that quick, that's terrifying!

Shido, massage them to stimulate the
growth. I do not mind.

I can't! And what happened to the whole me
chasing after you instead of vice versa thing?!
Surely by now you cannot resist me.

Ergh... I mean, sure. You're beautiful, but...
you can't win if your only goal is to stimuate
me.

If you want me, then take me. Do not
hold back. I am ready.
Jeez...
(In the end, Origami will always be Origami.)
(But... That's exactly what I love about her.)
Okay, Origami. I'll help you out.
Sh-Shido, at last... You're in the mood.

You sure about this, Origami? You want me
to take you?

I would never deny you. Do with me what
you will.
Then...
(I stepped closer to Origami, then I softly...)

(...put the shirt she was wearing onto her
shoulders.)
Shido...? What are you doing...?
Isn't it obvious, Origami?
(All I want to do with Origami is...)

We're going on a date. Let's take a walk
while the sun sets.
...So you still refuse to give in?

Yeah. We have the rest of our lives for that.
Besides Origami, don't you want to savor it?

Oh, yes. Whatever you want is what I want.
Being with you is the sweetest treasure in
the world.

Yeah. I enjoy being with you, too. Simply
walking and talking with you is all I want.
Forgive me, Shido. I may have rushed things.
It's fine. I accept you for who you are.
Right...

(We took a stroll, watching the glow of
sunset fade into the hill.)

(My love for Origami is as vast as the sky,
which is why I chose to tell her now...)

(We trekked towards the place where we
could be closest to it...)
Shido, why did you bring me here?

Remember when you took me here?
I thought it'd make for a perfect getaway.
Perfect?
Yup. I don't think I can contain myself.

(I stared deep into Origami's eyes. She
blushed a bit, perhaps feeling demure.)
From what?
Origami... I love you.

(I love you. I had never put it to words
before. I didn't know what love was.
At least, I never believed it myself.)

(But now, I can say for sure, I know.
This feeling is love.)

How you keep me on my toes. How you challenge
me. How I surprise you. How you make me laugh.
How you frustrate me. I love it all.

How I want you, and how you want me.
I love how you love me.

I want to be with you until the end of time.
As sure as the sun rises and falls, and becomes
morning once more. To be together forever.
Shido... I'm sorry.
Huh?

That's not what I mean. I thought I would be
the first to say it, but with how things turned
out today, you said it before me.

Oh. You scared me. I thought that was
almost a rejection. But it's okay to let
me take the lead.
That may be true.

Then, let me say it again. I want to be
with you forever.
Okay...

(Origami's eyes sparkled above her quivering
lips, and she nodded quietly.)

(No words needed to be said. I took her into
my soft embrace.)
(Beneath the sunset, our shadows became one.)
